verses.text: They that trust in the Lordshall beas mount Zion, Whichcannot be removed, butabideth for ever.
Asthe mountains areround about Jerusalem, So the Lordisround about his people From henceforth even for ever.
For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; Lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Do good, O Lord, unto those that begood, And to them that areupright in their hearts.
As for such as turn aside untotheir crooked ways, The Lordshall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: Butpeace shall beupon Israel.
